| 8 | 3, 5, 6, 7, 1, 2 | #P_siii | |- ( abs ` ( A .ih B ) ) <_ ( ( normh ` A ) x. ( normh ` B ) ) |
\
 Bunjakovaskij-Cauchy-Schwarz inequality.  Remark 3.4 of [Beran] p. 98. (Proved from ZFC version.)  (Contributed by NM, 24-Nov-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
